dcterms:creator: E. Balas
dcterms:description: A dataset used for solving the Set Covering Problem, which seeks to identify the minimum number of subsets that can cover a finite set completely.
dcterms:title: Set Covering Problem

dcterms:creator: Kevin Leyton-Brown
Mark Pearson
Yoav Shoham
dcterms:description: A dataset for the Combinatorial Auction Problem, which aims to allocate bids to maximize expected returns based on bidders' interests.
dcterms:title: Combinatorial Auction Problem

dcterms:creator: G. Cornuejols
R. Sridharan
J. M. Thizy
dcterms:description: A dataset for the Capacitated Facility Location Problem, which aims to satisfy customer demands at minimum cost while considering facility capacities.
dcterms:title: Capacitated Facility Location Problem

dcterms:creator: Cire
Andre Augusto
dcterms:description: A dataset for the Maximum Independent Set Problem, which seeks to find the largest independent set in an undirected graph.
dcterms:title: Maximum Independent Set Problem
